derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English handgeweorc, from hand + geweorc 'something made', interpreted in the 16th cent. as handy + work

entry.def: You can refer to something that you have done or made yourself as your handiwork .

example.ex: The architect stepped back to admire his handiwork...
example.tran: 设计师后退一步以欣赏自己的作品。

example.ex: While the government said the fire was accidental, residents of the town alleged it was the handiwork of the security forces.
example.tran: 虽然政府称火灾是场意外，镇上的居民却断言这是保安部队的杰作。

means.word_mean: 1. a work produced by hand labor
